{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubee |model=U10C018 |revision=.43 |asin=B00700Z6ZW,B001R5DJ7I, |est_release_date=08/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Ambit |manuf_model=U10C018 |manuf_rev=.43 |availability=EoL |type=cable modem |fcc_id= |pcb_id=K13C013 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3349;QAMLink, BCM3349KPBG, HK0726 P10, 827124 R2C; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160CBTC-90G |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632K-UC60 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 5-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1),, J353 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Direct Conversion Cable Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3419;BROADCOM, BCM3419KML, cP0724 P10, P2NK1 04;1; |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os=eCos; |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:1C:26,88:9F:FA, }} "K13C013", "REV:1.. GP 19.1971" , and a date code of '''0733''' :is silkscreened on one U10C018's (U10C018.43) board. *[https://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/3518/ambit-ubee-u10c018-80-cable-modem-teardown ''Ambit (Ubee) U10C018.80 Cable Modem'' Teardown on '''e360Â°'''] :Modem: [[Broadcom]] BCM3349KFBG (Single-Chip, QAMLink, DOCSIS 2.0) :Tuner: [[Broadcom]] BCM3421KML (Single-Chip, Cable TV, DOCSIS 2.0) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L1605AM2C-15G (NOR, 16Mb, SPI, 85MHz) :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4S641632K-UC75 (SDRAM 64Mb, 133MHz, 3.3V) :PSU: ''Ault, Inc.'' P48121000A060G - External Power Supply (12V/1A) *[https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00700Z6ZW?tag=wiki085-20 ''uBee Ambit U10C018 DOCSIS 2.0 Cable Modem'' on '''Amazon'''] :OUI: 88:9F:FA ([https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81xJ-suz0rL._SX679_.jpg Label image]) ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== seems to be the following... 
(...) (RxD) (3.3) (TxD) (GND)
                         J353
